widget.name: List view swipe
widget.description: Enable swipe action on a list view

property.caption: Target list view
property.description: Name of the list view. Place this widget directly below the list view

property.caption: List view entity
property.description: Entity type of the list view items, passed as context to the 'Open page' or 'Execute microflow' action

property.caption: On swipe action left
property.description: Action take on swipe

property.caption: Page left
property.description: Page to show after swiping, should contain a 'List view entity' data view. Only applicable for 'On swipe action' 'Show a Page'

property.caption: Microflow left
property.description: Microflow to execute after swiping. Only applicable for 'On swipe action' 'Call a microflow'

property.caption: Nanoflow left
property.description: Nanoflow to execute after swiping. Only applicable for 'On swipe action' 'Call a nanoflow'

property.caption: Swipe container left
property.description: Optional, name of the container which shown as background during swiping

property.caption: Transparent swipe left
property.description: Make item gradually transparent while swiping

property.caption: After swipe left
property.description: Animate effect after swipe: Continue the swipe movement 'Move out' of the list view. Animate 'hide' the item to zero height. 'Reset' the item immediate back to its original position. Animate the item to 'Move back' to it original position. Show the background buttons using 'Stick to button(s)'.

property.caption: Action delay left
property.description: Wait number of microseconds after swiping before triggering the action. Based on CSS animation, recommended: Move out, hide: 800. Move out, reset: 400. Move out: 400. Move back:0. Stick to button(s):na

property.caption: Hide container left
property.description: Optional, name of the container which shows a message during hide animation. Only applicable when 'After swipe' is 'Move out, hide'

property.caption: On swipe action right
property.description: Action take on swipe

property.caption: Page right
property.description: Page to show after swiping, should contain a 'List view entity' data view. Only applicable for 'On swipe action' 'Show a Page'
